categories: Category:Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2

nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 3

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 3 is the third issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 magazine published by De Agostini. It came with the primary Photoreceptor for the build-able R2-D2 and contained the articles "Innovation: Motion Control Filming", "R2-series astromech droids, Part 2" and "PCBs: Printed circuit boards".
